reviews.customers_say: Customers like the vest's fit, style, length, and sleeveless design with pockets. They appreciate its lightweight nature and nice material, with one customer noting how the fabric flows well. The vest runs extremely small according to multiple reviews, and customers have mixed opinions about the fabric thickness, with some finding it very thin.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Covers the behind
items.body: Nice material. Great length. Very comfortable . I'm 6 ft tall and this covers my behind which is what I was looking for when wearing leggings. I love the nice large pockets. They hold a phone nicely without it sticking out. I have not washed it yet. It was a little wrinkled coming out of the package but a quick steam took care of that. Great value for the money. Read more
items.author: Jen1n

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Order size up
items.body: Good Looking long vest! I bought a large and it fit well. I am 5’6 and weigh 140. I have not washed it yet, so I can’t comment on that aspect of this cute vest: Read more
items.author: Busy Mom

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love it
items.body: I live this sweater vest. It’s so light weight but still a good quality vest. I plan to get a couple more colors Read more
items.author: Cheryl Stockwell

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very nice long vest
items.body: Very nice long vest & hangs well. I wear a 22 top so ordered a 3X & it was a perfect fit however, upon trying to order more in different colors, 3X only comes in black! Take note supplier-plus women want more than black! Read more
items.author: Pinnelephant

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful vest, runs small! Order one size up!
items.body: Beautiful vest! But runs small! I will order one size up! Usually large it’s big , but this time, really small! I received this vest today, and had no tag! This is irritating, especially when upon returns, we are ask if tag is intact. Read more
items.author: Dinu D. Popa

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Size and color problems
items.body: Let me start by saying that I love this vest. The length is perfect, the style is great. The construction and material are great too. The side slit / opening on the sides is a great bonus and it hangs great with that feature. I have 2 problems with the 2 vests that I ordered. Both were the same size, one is black, the other navy. They both fit the same way. It was recommended that an XL would fit me, but I played it safe and ordered an XXL. They were still too small. The vest didn't come together in the front across my 42D chest, hence they looked small in that area. It came about half way across my breasts. I'm back to go up another size to a 1X . Keeping my fingers crossed that they fit. In regards to this vest looking presentable / comfortable / fitting properly, Id go up 2 sizes than what is recommended. Also, what is the most disappointing of all was the color of the navy vest that I received. The picture appears as a dark, rich navy color. It almost appears black. The one I received was closer to a royal blue than a deep navy. It don't believe its a monitor / computer issue because the color I received is too far off for that to be the problem. I will follow up with an update when I receive my larger vests. Hopefully I'll have a better report to share. Read more
items.author: Lisa

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Long Sleeve just to warm!
items.body: Very nice longer vest. Well made, and cool color. Read more
items.author: Grandma Patty

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice
items.body: Nice fill it runs a little sm Read more
items.author: stacy

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Sleeveless is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Sleeveless is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Gray, Navy, Wine Red, Khaki, Ivory, Dark Grey, Black, Coffee. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.
